pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This ebuild installs and configures "Sonic Robo Blast 2", a 3D Sonic The Hedgehog fangame based on Doom Legacy.
Let's run SRB2 the Gentoo way (TwT).

use.flag: Enable Curl support (needed for Master Server)
Enable NASM assembly optimizations (x86, amd64 only)
Enable Native Language Support based on GNU Gettext
Replace NASM with YASM assembly (x86, amd64 only)
Enable zlib compression (might be necessary in netgames)
